meaningMnemonic: What <kanji>place</kanji> in your house has most of the <kanji>machine</kanji>s in it? Your <vocabulary>kitchen</vocabulary>! Just think about it. Refrigerator, freezer, dishwasher, stove, microwave, WOW! That's so many. The kitchen definitely has the most machines.
readingMnemonic: This word consists of the on'yomi reading for 台 and the kun'yomi reading for 所. You've learned them both so as long as you remember the rendaku, you should be able to read this word too!
